lyrics:
34 contributorstranslationsfrançaisespañolpast lives lyricsintro
ooh ooh ooh

verse 1
past lives couldnt ever hold me down
lost love is sweeter when its finally found
ive got the strangest feelin
this isnt our first time around
past lives couldnt ever come between us
sometimes the dreamers finally wake up
dont wake me im not dreamin
dont wake me im not dreamin

verse 2
all my past lives they got nothin on me
golden eagle youre the one and only flying high
through the cities in the sky
ill take you way back countless centuries
dont you remember that you were meant to be
my queen of hearts meant to be my love

prechorus
through all of my lives
id never thought id wait so long for you
the timin is right
the stars are aligned
you might also likechorus
so save that heart for me
cause girl you know that youre my destiny ddestiny
swear to the moon the stars the sons and the daughters
our love is deeper than the oceans of water

postchorus
hurry
i need you now ive waited oh so long yeah
baby love
i need you now ive waited oh so long

verse 3
passin seasons empty bottles of wine
my ancient kingdom came crashing down without you
baby child im lost without your love
oh diamond sparrow my moonlit majesty
you know i need you come flying back to me

prechorus
through all of my lives
id never thought id wait so long for you
the timin is right
the stars are aligned

chorus
so save that heart for me
cause girl you know that youre my destiny ddestiny
swear to the moon the stars their sons and their daughters
our love is deeper than the oceans of water
save that heart for me
and girl ill give you everything you need everything you need
heres to our past lives our mothers and fathers
our love is deeper than the oceans of water

hurry
i need you now ive waited oh so long yeah
baby love
i need you now ive waited oh so long
